AlanMathisonTuringEnglishmathematician,computerscientist,logician,cryptanalyst,philosophertheoreticalbiologist.Hehighlyinfluentialdevelopmenttheoreticalcomputerscience,providingformalisationconceptsalgorithmcomputationTuringmachine,consideredmodelgeneral-purposecomputer.Turingwidelyconsideredfathertheoreticalcomputerscience.BornLondon,TuringraisedsouthernEngland.HegraduatedKing'sCollege,Cambridge,1938,earneddoctoratedegreePrincetonUniversity.DuringWorldWarII,TuringworkedGovernmentCodeCypherSchoolBletchleyPark,Britain'scodebreakingcentreproducedUltraintelligence.HeledHut8,sectionresponsibleGermannavalcryptanalysis.TuringdevisedtechniquesspeedingbreakingGermanciphers,includingimprovementspre-warPolishbombamethod,electromechanicalmachinecouldfindsettingsEnigmamachine.HeplayedcrucialrolecrackinginterceptedmessagesenabledAlliesdefeatAxispowersmanyengagements,includingBattleAtlantic.
